Name: Vaal
Traits: Innate Spellcasting. Vaal's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:At will: detect magic, fog cloud, light3/day each: feather fall, fly, misty step, telekinesis1/day each: control weather, gaseous form Keen Smell. Vaal has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.
Actions: Multiattack. Vaal makes two morningstar attacks. Morningstar. Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (3d8 + 8) piercing damage. Rock. Ranged Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 30 (4d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage.
